page.title: 18Amenities in Shoreham,Kent.
page.content:
Shoreham has{three shops;}a{general {store}with a{sub post office;a}sweets, drinks,and fancy goods shop;and, nearby,a{family butcher.}Many families buy the bulk of their shopping at the supermarkets in Sevenoaks and rely on the village shops for fresh food and extra items.There is a daily delivery of milk and newspapers.A{library van, {fishmonger and refuse lorry}visit weekly.There is{no gas}supply but solid fuel is delivered to order.
There are clubs for{football,cricket, {Cubs,Brownies,and Guides.The Shoreham {Society}acts as watchdog to protect the heritage of the village.The {Shoreham Players,Bellringers,Horticul- {tural Society,Church Choirs,and Play- {group}are active organisations in the village.There are{five public houses } in the area,and two others close by.
